result.execSummary:
The defendant Ricky M Steil was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Ricky M Steil in court, in custody, with attorney Carl William Chesshir.   Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Counts #2 & 3.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Count #2 & 3.  Count #1 is dismissed and read-in.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Chesshir makes statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #2:  IMPOSED SENTENCE OF:   

9 MONTHS JAIL STRAIGHT TIME   **CONCURRENT WITH PRESENT SENTENCE** 


COSTS:  $253.00 & $200.00 DNA surcharge  (to be paid in 120 days, alternate 14 days jail - then to be coverted to civil judgment)


COUNT #3:   IMPOSED SENTENCE OF:   

9 MONTHS JAIL STRAIGHT TIME   -   CONSECUTIVE TO COUNT #2 -       **CONCURRENT WITH PRESENT SENTENCE** 


COSTS:  $243.00   (to be paid in 120 days, alternate 14 days jail - then to be coverted to civil judgment)

Defendant Ricky M Steil in court, in custody, with Attorney Carl William Chesshir.   Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Chesshir requests an adjournment due to needing to go through plea form with Defendant.  Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 6, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Transcript received and filed for the following date and event: 09/12/14 preliminary & arraignment.
Detainer placed at Dodge Correctional Institution.
